parameters.query:
-- Get all active campaigns
SELECT 
  id as campaign_id,
  organization_id,
  name as campaign_name
FROM nurture_campaigns
WHERE status = 'active'
ORDER BY organization_id, created_at;

-- Calculate daily metrics for campaign
WITH daily_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    lce.campaign_id,
    lce.organization_id,
    -- Enrollment metrics
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
      WHEN DATE(lce.enrolled_at) = '{{ $('Prepare Date Range').first().json.analytics_date }}' 
      THEN lce.id 
    END) as leads_enrolled_today,
    
    -- Email send metrics
    COUNT(DISTINCT es.id) as emails_sent_today,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN es.send_status = 'queued' THEN es.id END) as emails_scheduled_today,
    
    -- Engagement metrics (unique per lead)
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN es.opened_at IS NOT NULL THEN es.lead_id END) as unique_opens_today,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN es.first_click_at IS NOT NULL THEN es.lead_id END) as unique_clicks_today,
    
    -- Problem metrics
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN es.send_status = 'bounced' THEN es.id END) as bounces_today,
    COUNT(DISTINCT ee.id) FILTER (WHERE ee.event_type = 'unsubscribe') as unsubscribes_today,
    
    -- A/B test breakdown
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
      WHEN es.opened_at IS NOT NULL AND lce.variant_assigned = 'A' 
      THEN es.lead_id 
    END) as variant_a_opens,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
      WHEN es.first_click_at IS NOT NULL AND lce.variant_assigned = 'A' 
      THEN es.lead_id 
    END) as variant_a_clicks,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
      WHEN es.opened_at IS NOT NULL AND lce.variant_assigned = 'B' 
      THEN es.lead_id 
    END) as variant_b_opens,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
      WHEN es.first_click_at IS NOT NULL AND lce.variant_assigned = 'B' 
      THEN es.lead_id 
    END) as variant_b_clicks
    
  FROM lead_campaign_enrollments lce
  LEFT JOIN email_sends es ON es.enrollment_id = lce.id
    AND DATE(es.actual_send_time) = '{{ $('Prepare Date Range').first().json.analytics_date }}'
  LEFT JOIN email_events ee ON ee.email_send_id = es.id
    AND DATE(ee.event_timestamp) = '{{ $('Prepare Date Range').first().json.analytics_date }}'
  WHERE lce.campaign_id = '{{ $json.campaign_id }}'
    AND lce.organization_id = '{{ $json.organization_id }}'
  GROUP BY lce.campaign_id, lce.organization_id
)
SELECT 
  *,
  -- Calculate rates
  CASE 
    WHEN emails_sent_today > 0 THEN
      ROUND((unique_opens_today::decimal / emails_sent_today::decimal) * 100, 2)
    ELSE 0
  END as open_rate,
  CASE 
    WHEN emails_sent_today > 0 THEN
      ROUND((unique_clicks_today::decimal / emails_sent_today::decimal) * 100, 2)
    ELSE 0
  END as click_rate,
  CASE 
    WHEN unique_opens_today > 0 THEN
      ROUND((unique_clicks_today::decimal / unique_opens_today::decimal) * 100, 2)
    ELSE 0
  END as click_to_open_rate,
  CASE 
    WHEN emails_sent_today > 0 THEN
      ROUND((unsubscribes_today::decimal / emails_sent_today::decimal) * 100, 2)
    ELSE 0
  END as unsubscribe_rate
FROM daily_stats;

-- Insert or update analytics
INSERT INTO campaign_analytics (
  organization_id, campaign_id, analytics_date,
  leads_enrolled_today, emails_sent_today, emails_scheduled_today,
  unique_opens_today, unique_clicks_today, unsubscribes_today, bounces_today,
  open_rate, click_rate, click_to_open_rate, unsubscribe_rate,
  variant_a_opens, variant_a_clicks, variant_b_opens, variant_b_clicks
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.organization_id }}',
  '{{ $json.campaign_id }}',
  '{{ $json.analytics_date }}',
  {{ $json.leads_enrolled_today }},
  {{ $json.emails_sent_today }},
  {{ $json.emails_scheduled_today }},
  {{ $json.unique_opens_today }},
  {{ $json.unique_clicks_today }},
  {{ $json.unsubscribes_today }},
  {{ $json.bounces_today }},
  {{ $json.open_rate }},
  {{ $json.click_rate }},
  {{ $json.click_to_open_rate }},
  {{ $json.unsubscribe_rate }},
  {{ $json.variant_a_opens }},
  {{ $json.variant_a_clicks }},
  {{ $json.variant_b_opens }},
  {{ $json.variant_b_clicks }}
)
ON CONFLICT (campaign_id, analytics_date)
DO UPDATE SET
  leads_enrolled_today = EXCLUDED.leads_enrolled_today,
  emails_sent_today = EXCLUDED.emails_sent_today,
  emails_scheduled_today = EXCLUDED.emails_scheduled_today,
  unique_opens_today = EXCLUDED.unique_opens_today,
  unique_clicks_today = EXCLUDED.unique_clicks_today,
  unsubscribes_today = EXCLUDED.unsubscribes_today,
  bounces_today = EXCLUDED.bounces_today,
  open_rate = EXCLUDED.open_rate,
  click_rate = EXCLUDED.click_rate,
  click_to_open_rate = EXCLUDED.click_to_open_rate,
  unsubscribe_rate = EXCLUDED.unsubscribe_rate,
  variant_a_opens = EXCLUDED.variant_a_opens,
  variant_a_clicks = EXCLUDED.variant_a_clicks,
  variant_b_opens = EXCLUDED.variant_b_opens,
  variant_b_clicks = EXCLUDED.variant_b_clicks,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING id;
